content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1.
Hi, I'm participant_2.
I see that you're an excellent student and you're going to graduate from college in two years. That's great! What do you want to do after college?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going to law school, but I'm also considering getting a job in the tech industry.
Both of those sound like great options. I'm sure you'll do great whatever you choose to do.
Thanks!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, go hiking, and spend time with my dog, Bart.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to read too, but I'm not much of a hiker. I've always wanted to get a dog, but I'm not sure if I'm ready for the responsibility.
Dogs are a lot of work, but they're also a lot of fun. They're great companions and they always make me happy.
I can see how that would be.
So, what do you do for fun?
I love to dance. I've been dancing since I was a little kid. I also love country music.
That's cool! I don't dance much, but I love listening to country music.
It's a great genre.
I agree.
I also love animals. I have a farm with pigs, horses, and hens.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've always wanted to have a farm.
It's a lot of work, but it's also a lot of fun. I love being around animals.
I can see how that would be.
So, what do you think? Do we have anything in common?
I think so! We both love to read, we both love country music, and we both love animals.
That's great! I think we're going to get along just fine.
